predicate.note: Frames file for 'typify' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: serve as an example of a class

example.name: representative example
example.text: Givaudan Far East Ltd., a Swiss concern that sells chemicals to shampoo and soap factories in China, typifies the problems.
example.arg: Givaudan Far East Ltd., a Swiss concern that sells chemicals to shampoo and soap factories in China,
